org.kew.rmf.transformers

Class RegexTransformer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.kew.rmf.transformers.RegexTransformer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Transformer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CapitalLettersExtractor, FakeHybridSignCleaner, StripNonAsciiAlphabeticCharactersTransformer, StripNonAsciiAlphanumericCharactersTransformer, StripNonNumericCharactersTransformer

    public class RegexTransformer
extends Object
implements Transformer
    A generic transformer that searches for all occurrences of a regular expression (regEx) pattern in a string and replaces each with a string replacement.
    replacement can be a normal string, or can include match groups like $1.
    It takes two optional parameters, removeMultipleWhitespaces (default true) and trimIt (default true)
